original_text: But Manasseh caused Judah's people and the people of Jerusalem to turn away from God. So they did more evil things than the people who lived in Canaan before them. The Lord had destroyed those nations so that the Israelites could live there.
korean_text: 유다와 예루살렘 주민이 므낫세의 꾀임을 받고 악을 행한 것이 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 멸하신 모든 나라보다 더욱 심하였더라

sentences.original_text: and the people of Jerusalem to turn away from God
So they did more evil things
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 더 악한 일들을 했다

sentences.original_text: than the people who lived in Canaan before them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들보다 먼저 가나안에 살았던 사람들보다 더

sentences.original_text: The Lord had destroyed those nations
so that the Israelites could live there
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이스라엘 백성들이 그곳에 살 수 있도록
